TextBlock.Text: DARVY: At last! We've finally finished the construction of the Geothermal Dynamo Generator!
DARVY: Thanks to the help of Quiax's sister Plod and the master builder Trov, of course. I only came up with the idea.
DARVY: Uh, nonetheless, this thing is supposed to be powered by the tidal forces exerted by what we've named Helioraxia.
DARVY: Both that and geothermal activity. Anyways, that's besides the point.
DARVY: Today I activate the machine that will be our first steps into the <color=orange>fourth dimension</color>!
DARVY: If this all goes well, we'll be able to conquer the <color=orange>Ghost Moon</color>!
DARVY: It may also confirm some of my suspicions. But I should mention this is dangerous, toying around with 4D matter. So if I don't come out alive,
DARVY: Nylox. Read my notebook. There is a digital copy <color=orange>inside</color> Ginth.
DARVY: NOW WE ACTIVATE THE MACHINE!
<color=red>(whirring can be heard, followed by a loud crash, and screaming)</color>
